java.rmi

Interface Remote

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Registry
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IxcRegistry

    public interface Remote
    The Remote interface serves to identify interfaces whose methods may be invoked from a remote client. Any object that is a remote object must directly or indirectly implement this interface. Only those methods specified in a "remote interface", an interface that extends java.rmi.Remote are available remotely.

    Implementation classes can implement any number of remote interfaces and can extend other remote implementation classes.

    Since:
    JDK1.1
    Version:
    1.14, 01/23/03
    Author:
    Ann Wollrath
